verses.verse: And it came to pass in the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H8084>eightieth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> after the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> were come <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, in the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H8010>Solomon<s%>'s <S%H4427>reign<s%> over <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, in the <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H2099>Zif<s%>, which is the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%>, that he began to <S%H1129>build<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.

And the <S%H1004>house<s%> which <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H1129>built<s%> for the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, the <S%H753>length<s%> there was <S%H8346>sixty<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%>, and the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> there <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H6967>cubits<s%>, and the height there <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%>.

And the <S%H197>porch<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1964>temple<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%>, <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> was the <S%H753>length<s%> <S%H7341>there<s%>, according to the breadth of the <S%H1004>house<s%>; and <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> was the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> there before the <S%H1004>house<s%>.
And for the <S%H1004>house<s%> he <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H2474>windows<s%> of <S%H331>narrow<s%> <S%H8261>lights<s%>.

And against the <S%H7023>wall<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> he <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H3326>chambers<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>, against the <S%H7023>walls<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>, both of the <S%H1964>temple<s%> and of the <S%H1687>oracle<s%>: and he <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H6763>chambers<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>:

The <S%H8481>nethermost<s%> <S%H3326>chamber<s%> was <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H7341>broad<s%>, and the <S%H8484>middle<s%> was <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H7341>broad<s%>, and the <S%H7992>third<s%> was <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H7341>broad<s%>: for outside in the wall <S%H2351>of<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> he <S%H5414>made<s%> narrowed <S%H4052>rests<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>, that the beams should not be <S%H270>fastened<s%> in the <S%H7023>walls<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%>.

And the <S%H1004>house<s%>, when it was in <S%H1129>building<s%>, was <S%H1129>built<s%> of <S%H68>stone<s%> made <S%H8003>ready<s%> before it was <S%H4551>brought<s%> <S%H4717>there<s%>: so that there was neither hammer nor <S%H1631>axe<s%> nor any <S%H3627>tool<s%> of <S%H1270>iron<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%>, while it was in <S%H1129>building<s%>.

The <S%H6607>door<s%> for the <S%H8484>middle<s%> <S%H6763>chamber<s%> was in the <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H3802>side<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%>: and they went <S%H5927>up<s%> with winding <S%H3883>stairs<s%> into the <S%H8484>middle<s%> <S%H8484>chamber<s%>, and out of the middle into the <S%H7992>third<s%>.
So he <S%H1129>built<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%>, and <S%H3615>finished<s%> <S%H5603>it<s%>; and covered the <S%H1004>house<s%> with <S%H1356>beams<s%> and <S%H7713>boards<s%> of <S%H730>cedar<s%>.

And then he <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H3326>chambers<s%> against all the <S%H1004>house<s%>, <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H6967>high<s%>: and they <S%H270>rested<s%> on the <S%H1004>house<s%> with <S%H6086>timber<s%> of <S%H730>cedar<s%>.
And the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> came to <S%H8010>Solomon<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Concerning this <S%H1004>house<s%> which you are in <S%H1129>building<s%>, if you will <S%H3212>walk<s%> in my <S%H2708>statutes<s%>, and <S%H6213>execute<s%> my <S%H4941>judgments<s%>, and <S%H8104>keep<s%> all my <S%H4687>commandments<s%> to <S%H3212>walk<s%> in <S%H6965>them<s%>; then will I perform my <S%H1697>word<s%> with <S%H1696>you<s%>, which I spoke unto <S%H1732>David<s%> your <S%H1>father<s%>:
And I will <S%H7931>live<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and will not <S%H5800>forsake<s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.
So <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H1129>built<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%>, and finished <S%H3615>it<s%>.

And he <S%H1129>built<s%> the <S%H7023>walls<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H1004>inside<s%> with <S%H6763>boards<s%> of <S%H730>cedar<s%>, both the <S%H7172>floor<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%>, and the <S%H7023>walls<s%> of the <S%H5604>ceiling<s%>: and he <S%H6823>covered<s%> them on the <S%H1004>inside<s%> with <S%H6086>wood<s%>, and <S%H6823>covered<s%> the <S%H7172>floor<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> with <S%H6763>planks<s%> of <S%H1265>fir<s%>.

And he <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> on the <S%H3411>sides<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%>, <S%H4480>both<s%> the <S%H7172>floor<s%> and the <S%H7023>walls<s%> with <S%H6763>boards<s%> of <S%H730>cedar<s%>: he even <S%H1129>built<s%> them for it <S%H1004>inside<s%>, even for the <S%H1687>oracle<s%>, even for the <S%H6944>most<s%> holy <S%H6944>place<s%>.
And the <S%H1004>house<s%>, that <S%H1964>is<s%>, the temple <S%H3942>before<s%> <S%H705>it<s%>, was forty cubits <S%H520>long<s%>.

And the <S%H730>cedar<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H6441>inside<s%> was <S%H4734>carved<s%> with <S%H6497>buds<s%> and <S%H6362>open<s%> <S%H6731>flowers<s%>: all was <S%H730>cedar<s%>; there was no <S%H68>stone<s%> <S%H7200>seen<s%>.

And the <S%H1687>oracle<s%> he <S%H3559>prepared<s%> <S%H8432>in<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H6441>inside<s%>, to <S%H5414>set<s%> there the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.

And the <S%H1687>oracle<s%> in the <S%H6440>front<s%> was <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> in <S%H753>length<s%>, and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> in <S%H7341>breadth<s%>, and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> in the <S%H6967>height<s%> <S%H6823>there<s%>: and he overlaid it with <S%H5462>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%>; and so <S%H6823>covered<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> which was of <S%H730>cedar<s%>.

So <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H6823>overlaid<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H6441>inside<s%> with <S%H5462>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%>: and he made a <S%H5674>partition<s%> by the <S%H7572>chains<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1687>oracle<s%>; and he <S%H6823>overlaid<s%> it with <S%H2091>gold<s%>.

And the whole <S%H1004>house<s%> he <S%H6823>overlaid<s%> with <S%H2091>gold<s%>, until he had <S%H8552>finished<s%> all the <S%H1004>house<s%>: also the whole <S%H4196>altar<s%> that was by the <S%H1687>oracle<s%> he <S%H6823>overlaid<s%> with <S%H2091>gold<s%>.
And inside the <S%H1687>oracle<s%> he <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3742>cherubims<s%> of <S%H8081>olive<s%> <S%H6086>tree<s%>, each <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H6967>high<s%>.

And <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> was the <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3671>wing<s%> of the <S%H3742>cherub<s%>, and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> the <S%H8145>other<s%> <S%H3671>wing<s%> of the <S%H3742>cherub<s%>: from the outermost <S%H7098>part<s%> of the one <S%H3671>wing<s%> unto the outermost <S%H7098>part<s%> of the <S%H3671>other<s%> were <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%>.

And the <S%H8145>other<s%> <S%H3742>cherub<s%> was <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%>: <S%H8147>both<s%> the <S%H3742>cherubims<s%> were of <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4060>measure<s%> and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7095>size<s%>.
The <S%H6967>height<s%> of the <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3742>cherub<s%> was <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%>, and so was it of the <S%H8145>other<s%> <S%H3742>cherub<s%>.

And he <S%H5414>set<s%> the <S%H3742>cherubims<s%> <S%H8432>inside<s%> the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%>: and they stretched <S%H6566>forth<s%> the <S%H3671>wings<s%> of the <S%H3742>cherubims<s%>, so that the <S%H3671>wing<s%> of the <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H5060>touched<s%> the one <S%H7023>wall<s%>, and the <S%H3671>wing<s%> of the <S%H8145>other<s%> <S%H3742>cherub<s%> <S%H5060>touched<s%> the <S%H8145>other<s%> <S%H7023>wall<s%>; and their <S%H3671>wings<s%> <S%H5060>touched<s%> <S%H3671>one<s%> <S%H3671>another<s%> in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%>.
And he <S%H6823>overlaid<s%> the <S%H3742>cherubims<s%> with <S%H2091>gold<s%>.

And he <S%H7049>carved<s%> all the <S%H7023>walls<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> round <S%H4524>about<s%> with <S%H6603>carved<s%> <S%H4734>figures<s%> of <S%H3742>cherubims<s%> and palm <S%H8561>trees<s%> and <S%H6362>open<s%> <S%H6731>flowers<s%>, <S%H6441>inside<s%> and <S%H2435>outside<s%>.
And the <S%H7172>floor<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> he <S%H6823>overlaid<s%> with <S%H2091>gold<s%>, <S%H6441>inside<s%> and <S%H2435>outside<s%>.

And for the <S%H6607>entering<s%> of the <S%H1687>oracle<s%> he <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H1817>doors<s%> of <S%H8081>olive<s%> <S%H6086>tree<s%>: the <S%H352>lintel<s%> and side <S%H4201>posts<s%> were a fifth part of the <S%H2549>wall<s%>.

The <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1817>doors<s%> also were of <S%H8081>olive<s%> <S%H6086>tree<s%>; and he <S%H7049>carved<s%> upon them <S%H4734>carvings<s%> of <S%H3742>cherubims<s%> and palm <S%H8561>trees<s%> and <S%H6362>open<s%> <S%H6731>flowers<s%>, and <S%H6823>overlaid<s%> them with <S%H2091>gold<s%>, and <S%H7286>spread<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%> upon the <S%H3742>cherubims<s%>, and upon the palm <S%H8561>trees<s%>.
So also <S%H6213>made<s%> he for the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H1964>temple<s%> <S%H4201>posts<s%> of <S%H8081>olive<s%> <S%H6086>tree<s%>, a fourth part of the <S%H7243>wall<s%>.

And the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1817>doors<s%> were of <S%H1265>fir<s%> <S%H6086>tree<s%>: the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H6763>leaves<s%> of the <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1817>door<s%> were <S%H1550>folding<s%>, and the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7050>leaves<s%> of the <S%H8145>other<s%> <S%H1817>door<s%> were <S%H1550>folding<s%>.

And he <S%H7049>carved<s%> on it <S%H3742>cherubims<s%> and palm <S%H8561>trees<s%> and <S%H6362>open<s%> <S%H6731>flowers<s%>: and <S%H6823>covered<s%> them with <S%H2091>gold<s%> <S%H3474>fitted<s%> upon the carved <S%H2707>work<s%>.

And he <S%H1129>built<s%> the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H2691>court<s%> with <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H2905>rows<s%> of hewed <S%H1496>stone<s%>, and a <S%H2905>row<s%> of <S%H730>cedar<s%> <S%H3773>beams<s%>.
In the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> was the <S%H3245>foundation<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H3245>laid<s%>, in the <S%H3391>month<s%> <S%H2099>Zif<s%>:

And in the <S%H259>eleventh<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%>, in the <S%H3391>month<s%> <S%H945>Bul<s%>, which is the <S%H8066>eighth<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%>, was the <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H3615>finished<s%> throughout all the <S%H1697>parts<s%> <S%H4941>there<s%>, and according to all the fashion of <S%H7651>it<s%>. So was he seven <S%H8141>years<s%> in building <S%H1129>it<s%>.
